text: Difficult years lie ahead, patience is required.
author: Yiannis Stournaras

text: If you have confidence you have patience. Confidence, that is everything.
author: Ilie Nastase

text: So it's been a slow process and it's taken some patience. That's why patients are called patients I think - patience is required.
author: Bowie Kuhn

text: I've done an awful lot of stuff that's a monument to public patience.
author: Tyrone Power

text: If we ever forget that we are One Nation Under God, then we will be a nation gone under.
author: Ronald Reagan
